messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a horde of mice have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: So... what's this about an arms dealer on station?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You realize we have access to your radio right. And that we control your access to it

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Well, Captain. We will need those weapons back. Immediately please

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We are sending a representative on board to oversee the deweaponization of your station, please comply with their requests

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The representative has arrived, Please comply with official Leech's requests

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research and Development.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: HAND IN YOUR FUCKING GUNS CUNTS

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
